We're hiring for a two-year position at Imperial College London:
Curriculum Development Teaching Fellow Formalisation.

The job will involve integrating Lean across Imperial's undergraduate mathematics course. For example, writing Lean-based lecture notes and exercises, writing tactics/automation to improve the educational experience in Lean, and teaching pilot courses.

Deadline is 19 September. We would be very happy to consider candidates with experience in Isabelle.
